columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the service token.

columns.name: slug
columns.description: The slug identifier for the service token.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The timestamp when the service token was created.

columns.name: config
columns.description: The configuration associated with the service token.

columns.name: environment
columns.description: The environment associated with the service token.

columns.name: project
columns.description: The project associated with the service token.

columns.name: expires_at
columns.description: The expiration timestamp of the service token.
